quote: I started doing Instagram videos, shorter form, TikTok, all the stuff that everyone else is kind of doing and I wasn't getting a lot of traction with it.
why_clipworthy: Highlights the importance of finding the right platform and content style for your audience.
suggested_hook: Struggling with social media traction? Here's what Phil Wells discovered.

quote: You have to be willing to do poor work that's not up to your taste standards until your skill develops.
why_clipworthy: Encourages agents to push through the discomfort of creating initial content.
suggested_hook: Feeling stuck with content creation? This mindset shift might help.
